source:
Placeholder here!!!

Thank you for trying AMP!

You got lucky! We have no ad to show to you!

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

How to display ads in your AMP HTML files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

How to display ads in your AMP HTML files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

How to display ads in your AMP HTML files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-ad` component in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-ad` component in the header.

sections.code:
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-ad/index.html">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: `amp-ad` requires `width` and `height` values. Select an ad network via the type argument.
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-ad` requires `width` and `height` values. Select an ad network via the type argument.

sections.doc_: Optionally `amp-ad` supports a child element with the `placeholder` attribute. If supported by the ad network, this element is shown until the ad is available for viewing.
sections.code: Placeholder here!!!
sections.preview: Placeholder here!!!
sections.normalizedDoc_: Optionally `amp-ad` supports a child element with the `placeholder` attribute. If supported by the ad network, this element is shown until the ad is available for viewing.

sections.doc_: `amp-ad` supports a child element with the `fallback` attribute. If supported by the ad network, this element is shown if no ad is available for this slot.
sections.code:
Thank you for trying AMP!

You got lucky! We have no ad to show to you!
sections.preview:
Thank you for trying AMP!

You got lucky! We have no ad to show to you!
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-ad` supports a child element with the `fallback` attribute. If supported by the ad network, this element is shown if no ad is available for this slot.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-ad</title>
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-ad" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-ad-0.1.js"></script>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-ad/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: amp-ad
document._description: How to display ads in your AMP HTML files.
